sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import FontAwesome from 'react-fontawesome'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { calcTime, convertMoney } from '../../helpers'; import { StyledMovieInfoBar } from '../styles/StyledMovieInfoBar'; const MovieInfoBar = ({ time, budget, revenue, tagline, status, release_date }) => (
Running time: {calcTime(time)}
status: {status}
Budget: {convertMoney(budget)}
Budget: {convertMoney(budget)}
Budget: {convertMoney(budget)}
Budget: {convertMoney(budget)}
Budget: {convertMoney(budget)}
Budget: {convertMoney(budget)}
Revenue: {convertMoney(revenue)}
); MovieInfoBar.propTypes = { time: PropTypes.number, budget: PropTypes.number, revenue: PropTypes.number, } export default MovieInfoBar;
